summary.para: Specifies a resource binding described by a range of bytes in a Direct3D 12 buffer, represented by an offset and size into an .

An optional pointer to an interface representing a buffer. The resource must have dimension , and the range described by this struct must lie within the bounds of the buffer. You may supply nullptr for this member to indicate 'no binding'.

The offset, in bytes, from the start of the buffer where the range begins. This offset must be aligned to a multiple of DML_MINIMUM_BUFFER_TENSOR_ALIGNMENT or the GuaranteedBaseOffsetAlignment supplied as part of the .
The size of the range, in bytes.
